articles.title: JWST reveals that galaxies grow up quickly in our Universe - Big Think
articles.summary: JWST reveals that galaxies grow up quickly in our Universe The first galaxies were irregular blobs of gas and stars. But modern features, like spiral arms and bars, appeared earlier than expected.
